actions.committee: House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Joint resolution to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp to honor the estimated 6 million Jews killed by Nazi Germany during the Second World War.

summary.text: Directs the United States Postal Service to issue a special postage stamp in commemoration of the estimated 6,000,000 Jews killed by Nazi Germany during World War II.

titles.title: Joint resolution to provide for the issuance of a special postage stamp to honor the estimated 6 million Jews killed by Nazi Germany during the Second World War.
